thread.title: Tom Wilson Gets His Face Bloodied After Taking Out Zach Parise With A Gnarly High Stick
thread.title_full: Tom Wilson Gets His Face Bloodied After Taking Out Zach Parise With A Gnarly High Stick

author: Patrick Redford
title: Tom Wilson Gets His Face Bloodied After Taking Out Zach Parise With A Gnarly High Stick
text:
Go to permalink Photo: Hannah Foslien/ AP 
The Capitals and Wild met tonight in Minnesota and things got feisty pretty quickly. In the first period, Caps winger Tom Wilson caught Zach Parise in the face with a high stick on center ice, earning a four-minute penalty for the reckless stick handling. 
Parise had to be helped off the ice. Shortly after Wilson returned, he inevitably caught some hands. Wilson tussled with the Wildâ€™s Chris Stewart, and managed to get some decent shots in and send him to the floor before Stewart left him bleeding. Recommended Stories
